nodes.text: The LW-1S was a podracer model produced by Vectron during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Its engines extended outward from the pod at the pilot's command.
The Vectron LW-1S was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on October 20, 2015 as one of the items in the Underworld Alliance Pack on the Cartel Market.
